p: ZIKV exhibits extreme versatility and modulates mechanisms of immune evasion; recent experimental advances have shown that ZIKV infects different cell types in several organs and tissues, confirming that transmission occurs not only by bites of infected mosquitos ( Aedes), but also by sexual and vertical routes). 3 In this context, it is believed that receptors belonging to the TIM and TAM families, particularly AXL, facilitate ZIKV entry in cells. 4
